body:
### Welcome to My Public GitHub Page

This is my public github page. I'll be posting links here for stuff I'll be publishing (mostly papers).

If you want to know more about me, go to [www.deanberris.com](http://www.deanberris.com/) -- for the C++ writings, go to [www.cplusplus-soup.com](http://www.cplusplus-soup.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Dean Michael Berris on GitHub
